arguments.template: ({{hint}}) {{label}} {{circleText}}

<input [id]="id + '-input'"
       class="nx-circle-toggle__input"
       [attr.aria-labelledby]="id + '-label'"
       [type]="type"
       [attr.name]="name"
       [checked]="checked"
       [disabled]= "disabled"
       [attr.aria-checked]="checked"
       (keydown.enter)="handleEnterKey($event)"
       (click)="toggle($event)">
<label class="nx-circle-toggle__label"
  [for]="id + '-input'"
  [id]="id + '-label'">
    <nx-icon-toggle-button
      [label]="label"
      [hint]="hint"
      [checked]="checked"
      [icon]="iconName"
      [negative]="negative"
      [svg]="svgUrl"
      [disabled]="disabled"
      [inGroup]="inGroup"
      [touched]="_touched"
      [circleText]="circleText">
    </nx-icon-toggle-button>
    <!-- The mobile toggle button is needed for the responsive mobile version of the component.
    The display swtich is handled in the css. -->
    <nx-mobile-toggle-button
      [label]="label"
      [hint]="hint"
      [checked]="checked"
      [negative]="negative"
      [disabled]="disabled"
      [circleText]="circleText">
    </nx-mobile-toggle-button>
</label>
